title: GoLow Golf - British Open Preview + Best Bets with Jason Sobel
itunes:title: GoLow Golf - British Open Preview + Best Bets with Jason Sobel
description:
John previews the British Open, the elephant in the room with Greg Norman being excluded from the tournament for spearheading LIV. He also handicaps the field, talks best bets with Action Network’s Jason Sobel, and empties out the GoLow mailbag!

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
